testcase.classname: Automation Practice End to End Test automation scenario
testcase.name: User opens the automation practise home page
testcase.system-out: Given User hit the Automation practice website..............................passed Then User verifies the site logo............................................passed And User verifies the page title............................................passed

testcase.classname: Automation Practice End to End Test automation scenario
testcase.name: Verify user login the application with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: When User click on Signin Button in Header..................................passed And User enter the email id.................................................passed And User enter the password.................................................passed And User click on Login Button in the Login Page............................passed Then User verifies the Username present in the header.......................passed

testcase.classname: Automation Practice End to End Test automation scenario
testcase.name: User selects the dress to add to cart
testcase.system-out: When User moves the mouse to the women......................................passed And User click on evening dress.............................................passed And User place the mouse pointer on evening dress image.....................passed Then User checks whether 'There is 1 product.' word is present at the top of the content page.passed And User click on the more option...........................................passed And User click on the add to cart option....................................passed Then User check for 'demo_4' word is present at the top of the content page.passed

testcase.classname: Automation Practice End to End Test automation scenario
testcase.name: User proceeds further to checkout
testcase.system-out: When User click on the frame to select the options..........................passed Then User verifies whether the word 'Printed Dress' is present in the frame.passed And User click on the proceed to checkout...................................passed Then User verifies whether the word 'In stock' is present...................passed And User click on the proceed to checkout in the summary page...............passed

testcase.classname: Automation Practice End to End Test automation scenario
testcase.name: User checks for the delivery address
testcase.system-out: When User click on the proceed to checkout in the address page..............passed Then User verfies for the word 'Terms of ser' is present in the content page.passed And User click on the checkbox..............................................passed And User click on proceed to checkout in the shipping page..................passed Then User verifies for the word 'Please choose your payment method' is present in the content page.passed

testcase.classname: Automation Practice End to End Test automation scenario
testcase.name: User proceeds to payment
testcase.system-out: When User click on pay by check option......................................passed And User click on sign out button present in the header.....................passed
